name: Five Night at Freddy's: Character Creation.
name_original: Five Night at Freddy's: Character Creation.
description:
This game is a prequel to Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach.

In this game, you play as a girl named Vanny, who got a job in a new mall dedicated to the old pizzeria with animatronic "Freddy Fazbear's Pizza", where children were rumored to be missing. Vanny, not understanding the history of the pizzeria, decides to study it, and immediately downloads to his phone a strange game in which he has to create his own characters. But is it that simple?

This game is my first game, and initially I created it for fun because of the tiktok edit. 😅So the game turned out So so. But if you find bugs, then write in the comments. OwO

So far, there is only the first chapter of this game. Chapter 2 will be released later this month. UwU

#fangame #horror #fnaf
